qas.question: John XXIII continued the gradual reform of what?
He published changes that resulted in what?
What did Pope Pius V establish in 1570?
Pope Benedict XVI authorized continued use of the Roman Missal in what year?
When was the Roman Rite created?
What did Pope Benedict XVI continue the gradual reform of?
What did the changes published by Pope Benedict XVI cause?
What did Pope John XXIII establish in 1570?

plausible_answers.text: at the request of the Council of Trent

qas.question: Why did Pope John XXIII establish the Tridentine Mass?
What did Pope Pius V continue to authorize the use of in 2007?

context: Maintaining continuity with his predecessors, John XXIII continued the gradual reform of <a0_0><b5_0>the Roman liturgy<b5_0/><a0_0/>, and published changes that resulted in <a1_0><b6_0>the 1962 Roman Missal<b6_0/><a1_0/>, the last typical edition containing <a2_0><b7_0><b9_0>the Tridentine Mass<b9_0/><b7_0/><a2_0/> established in 1570 by Pope Pius V <b8_0>at the request of the Council of Trent<b8_0/> and whose continued use Pope Benedict XVI authorized in <a3_0>2007<a3_0/>, under the conditions indicated in his motu proprio Summorum Pontificum. In response to the directives of the Second Vatican Council, later editions of the Roman Missal present the <a4_0>1970<a4_0/> form of the Roman Rite.
